basics.name: Juan Loreiro
basics.label: FullStack Developer
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Misiones. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2027. Additionally, I have previous studies and constat training in software engineering and bioinformatics, also have varied experience in web development, database testing, widely used lenguages and frameworks such as: Tailwind, Css, HTML, Jacascript, TypeScript, React.js, Elixir, Phoenix, Among others

courses: Tester - QA with practices and Finished
